basics.name: Supratik "Neil" Baksi
basics.label: Bachelors of Engineering (Software) Graduate
basics.summary:
Bachelors of Engineering (Software) Honours Graduate currently working at Limepay Pty Ltd. as a Front-End Developer by applying my experience in UI/UX Design and Web Development and leveraging new and existing technologies, and implementing effective solutions.
 I also Freelance as a Shopify Developer and a React Developer.
basics.interests: Website Development, User Interaction/Experience Design, Data Analytics, Machine Learning, Online Marketing

highlights: Assist in the development of Limepay-Domain (https://www.domain.com.au/) joint venture - MarketNow in ReactJS/Redux and miscellaneous other tasks relating to marketing - websites and emails.
Assist in maintaining the Limepay website and linked marketing pages in Gatsby.js with Netlify
Assist in creation and maintenance of the Limepay Developer Docs with Redocly
Converted and developed the Limepay Customer, Merchant and Admin dashboards for the Limepay core BNPL product from PUG(Node.js) to ReactJS/Redux.
Assist in UI development by closely working with UI/UX Designer in Figma
Maintain units tests using JEST, Enzyme and E2E tests using Cypress
Maintain company email templates in BeePro and Amazon SES
Assist in the designing, creation and development of EnterOffer website and features using ReactJS and other front end technologies, and integrated with Firebase Database, Storage and hosted over AWS
Exposed to eCommerce website builders like Shopify, Wix, BigCommerce

work.summary: Director,Store Manager, Shopify Developer, Marketting Head
highlights: Creation and maintainace of Beauty & Fashion eCommerce Store on Shopify
Manager of SEO and social media marketting
Manager of Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, Google Ads, etc.

work.summary: Provide Level 1 IT Support ‚Äì Manage the software and hardware infrastructure and Website Administrator
highlights: Assist in the designing and creation of a new Agape Henry Crux website on Squarespace and management of and old website on WordPress
Involved in online marketing of company services using Google Ads and search engine optimisation
Troubleshooting and liaising with clients and service providers

work.summary: Developed an Application Compliance Monitoring Dashboard for pre-production and production servers
highlights: Creatively utilised Powershell, IIS, XML+XSLT, Microsoft ActiveDirectory, Excel, SharePoint, Visio in developing an optimal Compliance Monitoring Dashboard.
Effectively generated reports and data visualisation using Microsoft PowerBI
Gained valuable knowledge on Level 3 Application support
Worked efficiently with managing offshore clients, taking calls, queue management, picking up tickets on HP Service Manager and handling tickers of varying severity
Collaborated closely with team members in managing the process of applications from pre-production to production environment
Held similar positions at Alseasons Hospitality, The Star Entertainment Group, Benchmarque
